reviewText: I purchased this volume for "Danger Zone" which, while entertaining, was really part of a proposed tv series, according to reports I've read. One can tell that it unfolds like a tv show rather than a feature film. The theatrical release "The Big Chase" was also entertaining but with all the flair of a good tv show of the era. "David Harding, Counterspy" initially held no interest for me when I purchased the dvd but ironically turned out to be a very good film of its kind and the best of this volume's three offerings.
